Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the video by implying that it is related to the 2019 Indian elections, when in fact it is two years old.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the video is from the 2019 election.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is from a previous incident in 2017, not the 2019 election.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the video, which is that it is unrelated to the 2019 election and was instead from a previous incident in Srinagar.
